---
title: "ATRT heat maps"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
library(htmltools)
library(d3heatmap)
tags$style('.d3heatmap { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; }')
```

## MYC Group

```{r MYC, echo=FALSE}
#load("data/MYCmat.rda")
d3heatmap(t(MYCmat), scale = "column",Colv = FALSE)
```

## SHH Group

```{r SHH, echo=FALSE}
d3heatmap(t(SHHmat), scale = "column",Colv = FALSE)
```

## TYR Group

```{r TYR, echo=FALSE}
d3heatmap(t(TYRmat), scale = "column",Colv = FALSE)
```

## Side by Side

```{r SbS, echo=FALSE}
d3heatmap(t(MYCmat), scale = "column",Colv = FALSE)
d3heatmap(t(SHHmat), scale = "column",Colv = FALSE)
d3heatmap(t(TYRmat), scale = "column",Colv = FALSE)
```

## All Groups

```{r AG, echo=FALSE}
d3heatmap(t(ATRTmat), scale = "column",Colv = FALSE)
```
